amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to ensure that teachers, parents and other educational professionals receive education on the harms of copyright piracy in order to further educate students to that end.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures that teachers, parents and other educational professionals receive education on the harms of copyright piracy in order to further educate students to that end.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jeffries amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jeffries amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Jeffries.
